summary: Comprehensive testing of Circle of Care mental health platform completed. Backend API testing shows 76.9% success rate with most endpoints working correctly. Frontend testing shows excellent results with all major features functional including marketing website, authentication flow, and responsive design.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 error when processing invalid session ID instead of proper 400 error
critical_bugs.impact: Poor error handling for invalid authentication attempts

timeout_issues.issue: Request timeout after 15 seconds during panic button testing
timeout_issues.impact: Critical feature may be unavailable during crisis situations

minor_issues.issue: CORS OPTIONS requests return 405 instead of 200/204
minor_issues.impact: May cause CORS issues in some browsers

design_issues.issue: 1 out of 4 images missing alt text for accessibility

mobile_issues.issue: Mobile menu button not found on mobile viewport (390x844)
mobile_issues.impact: Navigation may be difficult on mobile devices

passed_tests: Authentication endpoints (proper 401 responses for unauthorized access)
Marketing website loads with proper branding
Navigation links work correctly (Features, Communities, Support)
All website sections present (Features, Communities, Support)
All 4 feature cards present (AI Companion, Safe Communities, Peer Support, Privacy First)
All 3 community types present (PTSD, Chronic Pain, Cancer)
Join Now buttons redirect to Emergent Auth correctly
Authentication flow redirects unauthenticated users properly
Footer with all 3 emergency contacts present
Accessibility features (10 headings, 3/4 images with alt text)
action_item_for_E1: Fix backend session error handling (500 -> 400 for invalid session IDs) and investigate panic button timeout issue. Consider adding mobile menu button for better mobile navigation. Add alt text to remaining image for accessibility compliance.
